# Adverse effects of the Sodium Bicarbonate supplementation
## Conditional probabilities

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository consists of conditional probabilities to test if individuals who show
(severe or frequent) adverse effects arising from sodium bicarbonate
supplementation have a higher probability of showing more symptoms than
those who show trivial adverse effects.
